mapper.insert: insert into op_log (corp_id, org_code, op_content, op_user_id, op_tellerno, op_type, op_time, gmt_create, create_id, gmt_modified, modified_id, is_deleted) values (#{corpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opTellerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{createId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, sysdate(), #{modifiedId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDeleted, jdbcType=INTEGER})
